amendment.description: Amendment requires that the CFTC also provide updates of the status of its consultations with U.S. producers and consumers of aluminum.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in House Report 114-136 to add language clarifying that status of consultations with all U.S. market participants including major producers and consumers should be added to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
